I love it Frank.  I guess they were tired of us all asking questions, they figured it was their turn, lol.
   
  Juli

Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@...> wrote:
           This is a first, as far as I can remember. I don't know who Vergi is, at least on this level, it's more likely this amnesia that we all suffer from on this level. I like EVPmaker cuz you tend to get higher levels. 
 
 When EVPmaker works, it puts everything else to shame.
 
 
 
 Frank-S
 
.
